name: RainWidget
description: RainWidget is a powerful widget engine based on Chrome Core that allow you create stunning smooth animations widgets using the latest web technologies(JS HTML5 CSS3) for your desktop . Choose an existing widget or create your own and share it to the Online Gallery!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 512 MB available space
